text:
Jerry: OK. LAST
QUESTION.

BAT WINGS,
DRAGON SCALES,
AND FRUIT PUNCH

MAKE WHAT KIND
OF POTION?

A--INVISIBILITY,
B--SKIN OF STEEL,

C--A REFRESHING
FRUIT SMOOTHIE.
GOT IT.

DOES HE HAVE TO SAY
"GOT IT" AFTER
EVERY QUESTION?

IT'S THROWING ME OFF
ON MY EXAM.
WE'RE TAKING AN EXAM?
[BELL RINGS]
TIME. PENCILS DOWN.
LAST EXAM SESSION.

GRAB YOUR WANDS
AND LINE UP.

YOU HAVE TO USE
THE TRANSFIGURATION
SPELL TO CHANGE

ONE OF
THESE GUINEA PIGS
INTO A WHITE DOVE.

OK, JUSTIN,
YOU'RE UP.
AHEM.

THIS GUINEA PIG
IS NOW NOT.

A DOVE WITH WINGS
SHOULD FILL ITS SLOT.

OH, OH! VERY
GOOD, JUSTIN.
ALEX, YOU'RE UP.
OH! OK.

UM, THIS
GUINEA PIG
IS NOW NOT.

A DOVE WITH
WINGS SHOULD
FILL ITS SLOT.

AW. IT'S
A PRETTY DOVE.

NO. OOH! IT'S
A PRETTY BRICK.

YOU WEREN'T CONCENTRATING.
MAX, YOU'RE UP.
AHEM!

THIS GUINEA PIG
IS NOW NOT.

A DOVE WITH
WINGS SHOULD
FILL WITH SNOT.
[AH-CHOO]
I SAID "SNOT," DIDN'T I?

OK, EVERYBODY RECORD
YOUR TRANSFIGURATION
RESULTS

IN YOUR MIDTERM EXAM
TEXT BOOKLETS.

I DON'T KNOW
WHY YOU GUYS

EVEN BOTHER TAKING
THE TESTS.

WE ALL KNOW THAT
I'M THE ONE THAT'S
GOING TO WIN

THE FAMILY WIZARD CONTEST
AND KEEP MY POWERS.

THAT'S NOT FOR
A LONG WHILE, JUSTIN.

AND WHAT IF THEY
CHANGE THE RULES SO ONLY
GIRLS KEEP THEIR POWERS?

OH, WAIT. YOU STILL
MIGHT WIN.

OH, ALEX, YOU'RE
SO TRANSPARENT.

YOU KNOW THAT I'M BETTER
THAN YOU AT MAGIC,

SO YOU HAVE TO LASH OUT
AND MAKE FUN OF ME.

AND YOU DON'T TAKE
ANY OF THIS MAGIC
SERIOUSLY.

I CAN'T TAKE YOU
SERIOUSLY.

YOU USE BIG WORDS
LIKE "TRANSPARENT."

WHAT ARE YOU,
BRITISH?
NO. BUT I AM.

PROFESSOR CRUMBS,
ALWAYS NICE TO SEE YOU.

THE BEARD IS COMING
IN NICELY.
HA HA. JERRY.

HA HA. I KNEW YOUR
FATHER WHEN THIS WAS
JUST A SOUL PATCH
FOR THE LOVELY WITCHES.
[CHUCKLES NERVOUSLY]

I'M HERE TO COLLECT YOUR
EXAMS AND TAKE THEM BACK
TO WIZ TECH.

WHY DOESN'T DAD JUST
GRADE OUR PAPERS?

SO THAT NO ONE WILL
GET BETTER GRADES

JUST BY BATTING THEIR EYES
AND TRYING TO LOOK CUTE.

ARE YOU TALKING
ABOUT ME?

[IMITATING ALEX]
ALEX, YOU'RE
DOING IT RIGHT NOW.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL, NO DOUBT,
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪
♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ EVERYTHING IS NOT
WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE
WHAT YOU WANT ♪
♪ BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

WIZARD REPORT CARDS
ARE HERE!

OH, YOU SOUND EXCITED.
YOU MUST FEEL CONFIDENT
YOU DID WELL.
OH.

[SOFTLY]
WIZARD REPORT
CARDS ARE HERE.
YOU FIRST.

[MALE VOICE
IMITATES FANFARE]

MAX RUSSO, YOUR EXAM
RESULTS PLUS YOUR
COURSE WORK
EQUALS A SOLID C-PLUS.

YOU ARE TOTALLY
AVERAGE. COOL!

Max: SWEET!
I GOT A "C."

[MALE VOICE
IMITATES FANFARE]

ALEX RUSSO, YOUR
EXAM RESULTS PLUS
THE HOMEWORK

YOU HANDED IN ON
GREASY NAPKINS

THAT SMELLED LIKE
SHRIMP--OOH--
EQUALS...
[BLOWS RASPBERRY]
"F." AND THE...

[BLOWS RASPBERRY]
IS A LOW "F."

EXCUSE ME. I TURNED
A GUINEA PIG INTO
A VERY SOLID BRICK,

WHICH I THINK IS
A MUCH MORE EFFECTIVE
SYMBOL FOR PEACE.

PLEASE! HAVE YOUR
PARENTS SIGN ME

SO I CAN RETURN
TO WIZARD TECH AND
RECEIVE MY PAYMENT.

I HAVE TO MAKE
A LIVING.

I DOUBT, FRANKLY,
THAT'S GONNA HAPPEN.
NO, NO, NO, NO, NO!

I GOT CHILDREN
TO LAMINATE.

WHAT ARE
YOU GOING TO DO?

MOM AND DAD NEED TO
SIGN THEM.

WELL, THEY CAN'T
SIGN SOMETHING
THAT NEVER GOT HERE.

BUT IT
GOT HERE.
NO, IT DIDN'T.

YES, IT DID.
YES, IT DID?

NO, IT DIDN'T.
WHAT ARE WE
TALKING ABOUT?

I DON'T KNOW.
PERFECT.

OH, THE REPORT CARDS
ARE HERE! HA HA.

I GOT TO MAKE A COPY
FOR MY NEW FRAME.

[MALE VOICE
IMITATES FANFARE]

JUSTIN RUSSO,
YOUR EXAM RESULTS PLUS
YOUR COURSE WORK

EQUALS ALL As
AND ONE B-PLUS--
IN WRITING SONGS.
YOU'RE THE SMART ONE.

B-PLUS? I CAN'T PUT
THIS IN THE FRAME.

WHAT A SHAME. SEE, I GOT
GAME. THIS GRADE IS LAME.

OH, I GOT
A GOOD RHYME. CORN.
AND?
UGH! I PANICKED.

OH! I LOVE IT
IN THERE.

IT SMELLS LIKE
POPCORN.

WHY DON'T YOU HUSH? I
THOUGHT I THREW YOU AWAY.

YOU CAN'T THROW
ME AWAY.

I NEED A PARENT
TO SIGN ME,

AND PREFERABLY WITH
A NICE SOFT-TIP PEN.

Jerry:
SEE YOU LATER, HONEY.
I'LL BE BACK IN AN HOUR.
I'M GOING FOR A JOG.

ARE YOU DOING
THE DISHES?
UH...YEAH. SURE!

OH, I KNOW WHAT
YOU'RE DOING.

YOU'RE AFRAID OF WHAT'S
GONNA HAPPEN WHEN YOUR
REPORT CARD GETS HERE.

SO YOU'RE TRYING
TO BE EXTRA GOOD.

YUP. YOU ALWAYS KNOW
WHAT I'M UP TO, DAD.

HA HA HA!
HA HA!
[GARBAGE DISPOSAL RUNNING]
♪ I'M BACK! ♪
OH, YEAH?

WELL, LET'S SEE IF
YOU KEEP TALKING

WHEN YOU'RE FULL
OF HOT SAUCE!
OW! OW!

THAT IS HOT!
OW! OW! OW...

Report card:
YOU KNOW WHAT?
I FEEL BAD FOR YOU.

I'M GONNA TELL YOU
HOW TO GET RID OF
A BAD REPORT CARD.
REALLY? HOW?
GET GOOD GRADES.

OOH! NOW YOU'LL
BE GRADED TWICE,
ALEX, WHAT ARE YOU DOING?

MOM! THAT WAS JUST
CONFETTI FOR THE PARADE.
THERE'S NO PARADE.

NOT YET,
BUT THERE WILL BE.

AND HOW PROUD ARE WE
GONNA BE WHEN WE'RE
THE FIRST ONES

TO THROW THE CONFETTI?
MY GUESS, PRETTY PROUD.

YOU KNOW WHAT?
I'VE GOT A MAGAZINE
AND AN ICED TEA.

I'M GOOD
WITH WHATEVER
YOU'RE UP TO.

HEY, IS THAT THE NEW
ISSUE OF "URBAN
TERRACE GARDENING"?

I'VE BEEN WAITING
FOR THAT.
ALEX!

OHH. I GOT
TO THE CORNER,

AND I REALIZED I
FORGOT TO STRETCH.
AND IT'S HOT.

I THINK I'LL START
JOGGING IN THE FALL.

Report card, muffled:
♪ DEE DEE DEE DEE ♪

ALEX RUSSO, YOUR
EXAM RESULTS PLUS
THE HOMEWORK
YOU HANDED IN...

WHAT DID YOU SAY,
ALEX?
OH, NOTH--NOTHING.

[MUFFLED]
ALEX, IT'S NOT
VERY LADYLIKE

TO TALK
WITH YOUR MOUTH FULL.
[BURPS]
HEY, WHAT'S THAT?

THESE PARENTS ARE
NOW NOT.

WHAT ARE YOU
DOING?

TWO GUINEA PIGS
SHOULD FILL
THEIR SLOTS.
[CHATTERING]

WHAT DID I JUST DO?
I PANICKED.

I HAD TO BUY
MYSELF MORE TIME.
TO DO WHAT?
TO PANIC!
[GUINEA PIGS CHATTERING]

I STILL DON'T KNOW
WHY YOU'D SPEND
YOUR ENTIRE SAVINGS

ON A GIANT BLOW-UP
EXERCISE BALL.
IT'S FOR EXERCISE?

AW, MAN! I WAS GONNA
BLOW THIS UP,

THEN WALK ACROSS
THE OCEAN IN IT.
THAT IS EXERCISE, MAXIE.
OH, MAN!

COOL GUINEA PIGS.
CAN I RACE THEM?
NO. I'M STILL WORKING

ON DAD'S
TRANSFIGURATION SPELL,
AND THESE GUINEA PIGS

HAVE TO STAY IN THEIR
CAGE, NO MATTER WHAT.

FINE. I'LL JUST GO
ASK MOM AND DAD.
MOM AND DAD AREN'T HERE

BECAUSE THEY WENT TO
AN EMERGENCY SANDWICH
SHOP CONVENTION.

EMERGENCY SANDWICH
SHOP CONVENTION?

YEAH. YOU KNOW HOW
YOU WERE ALL TWEAKED

BECAUSE SANDWICH WRAPS
ARE REALLY TORTILLAS

AND THEY DON'T GET
ENOUGH CREDIT?

WELL, PEOPLE ARE
FINALLY GETTING
BEHIND THAT.

YES! MY E-MAIL
CAMPAIGN WORKED.

WAIT. NOW, GET OUT
OF HERE, YOU GUYS.

I'M HAVING MY A.P. BIOLOGY
FRIENDS OVER

TO WATCH THE NEW EPISODE
OF "VOLCANO DISCOVERY"
IN HIGH DEF,

AND I DON'T WANT YOU
GUYS TO EMBARRASS ME.

WE ARE NOT THE EMBARRASSING
PART OF WHAT YOU JUST SAID.

Boy: THAT WAS THE BEST
VOLCANO SPECIAL EVER!

THE HIGH DEF MADE IT SEEM
LIKE THE VOLCANO WAS RIGHT
IN YOUR LIVING ROOM.

OH, WHICH,
GEOLOGICALLY
SPEAKING,

WOULD BE
A STATISTICAL
IMPROBABILITY

ALONG THE LINES OF
THERE BEING
A SNOW STORM

IN THE SAHARA
DESERT.

OH, HO HO! YOU GOT ME.
GOOD NERD BURN.
[BOTH MAKE SILLY NOISE]

HA HA!
HA HA!

WELL,
I'M OFF TO THE PARK
TO BURY SOMETHING.
OH, A TIME CAPSULE?
YEAH, SURE. THAT.

I LOVE DOING THAT.
YOU SHOULD PUT
A CELL PHONE IN IT,

CALL IT,
AND LEAVE IT
A VOICE MAIL,

SO THAT WAY, SOMEONE
IN THE FUTURE
CAN PICK IT UP.

OH, NO. ACTUALLY,
PEOPLE TAKE MY CALLS NOW.

HARPER, WHAT ARE YOU
DOING HERE?

I HEARD ABOUT
JUSTIN'S BIG PARTY,

AND I'VE BEEN WORKING
UP THE NERVE TO CRASH IT.

OH, WELL, I'VE BEEN
WORKING UP THE NERVE
TO LEAVE.

OH, LOOK.
I DID IT. HA.
HEY, EVERYONE,

SO VOLCANOES, HUH?
THAT'S A HOT TOPIC.

AM I RIGHT? HA HA HA!
HA HA HA....
VOLCANOES, THEY'RE HOT!
WE'RE OFF VOLCANOES.

NOW WE'RE DEBATING
WHO'S SMARTER,

A 12-YEAR-OLD BOY
OR A COMMON GUINEA PIG.

OOH, I'M ON
JUSTIN'S SIDE.

WHICH SIDE ARE
YOU ON, JUSTIN?

AS ALWAYS, I'M ON
THE SIDE OF SCIENCE.

THIS CALLS
FOR AN EXPERIMENT.
[GUINEA PIGS CHATTERING]

THIS WAS SO TOTALLY
WORTH MY ALLOWANCE.

I'M GONNA USE IT
FOREVER.

OK. WHEN HARPER SAYS
GO, YOU'LL BOTH TRY
AND MAKE YOUR WAY

TO THE STACK OF
CHEESE SLICES

LOCATED OUTSIDE
THE SUBWAY CAR.
GO!
Max: UH-OH!
WHOA!
I HATE THIS THING.

ALEX'S GUINEA PIGS ARE
GETTING AWAY.
CATCH THEM!

OH, MAN. WE LOST
ALEX'S GUINEA PIGS.

I KNEW IF I HAD
A PARTY WITHOUT
PARENTAL SUPERVISION,
THIS WOULD GET OUT OF HAND.

OH, ALEX IS GONNA
FREAK OUT

UNLESS WE BUY
TWO MORE GUINEA PIGS
AT THE PET STORE.

GOOD THINKING.
GOOD THINKING. UM...

LET'S HIDE THIS IN
THE LAIR SO ALEX
DOESN'T FIND IT.

AND THEN WE'LL GO
TO THE PET STORE. THEY
ALWAYS GIVE ME A TREAT.

THOSE ARE
DOG BISCUITS.

I KNOW. WHAT DO YOU THINK
KEEPS MY TEETH SO WHITE
AND MY HAIR SO SHINY?

LOOK, YOU CHANGE INTO
A "C" NOW,

AND I PROMISE I'LL GET
AN "A" NEXT SEMESTER,
AND IT'LL ALL EVEN OUT.
SORRY.

THEN YOU
LEAVE ME NO CHOICE.

ALEX RUSSO,
YOU HAVEN'T RETURNED
YOUR WIZARD REPORT CARD.

Report card: WOW!
TALK ABOUT A PAPER CUT!

I NEED TO SPEAK
TO YOUR PARENTS
STRAIGHTAWAY.

I HOPE THAT'S BRITISH
FOR MUCH, MUCH LATER.

NO? OK, UM, COULD YOU
JUST GIVE ME ONE MINUTE?

ACTUALLY, MY PARENTS
TOOK MY REPORT CARD
WITH THEM

TO A SANDWICH SHOP
CONVENTION.

I'M SURE YOU'RE
FAMILIAR

WITH THE TORTILLA
VERSUS SANDWICH WRAP
CONTROVERSY.
I AGREE.
TORTILLAS WERE CHEATED.

I CAN SEE WHY
YOUR PARENTS DOVE INTO
THIS MOST PRESSING CRISIS.
I'M SORRY I QUESTIONED YOU.

WILL YOU ACCEPT
MY APOLOGY?

DEFINITELY. THANKS
FOR STOPPING BY.
DON'T BE A STRANGER.

SAY HI TO THE LITTLE
WARLOCKS FOR ME.

LET'S WIZARD
HANDSHAKE ON IT.

THE--THE TWO-HANDED
WIZARD HANDSHAKE?
THAT'S THE ONE.
OK.
OW!

THE ONLY THING SHE GETS
AN "A" IN IS HIDING
AND LYING.
BE STILL.
YOU LIED TO ME.
I CAN EXPLAIN.

I'M NOT INTERESTED
IN WHAT YOU HAVE
TO SAY ANYMORE.

I'M COMING BACK TONIGHT
TO SEE YOUR PARENTS,

AND WE'LL DECIDE HOW LONG
TO SUSPEND YOUR POWERS.

MY POWERS?
NO, YOU CAN'T.
I'M GONNA NEED THOSE.

UM, I'M ALSO GONNA
NEED TO KNOW

A SOUND THAT
SOMEONE COULD MAKE TO
ATTRACT A GUINEA PIG,
FOR INSTANCE.

OH, I WOULD TRY A SORT
OF RABBITY THING,

BUT WITH MORE SALIVA.
PFFT, PFFT, PFFT.
DESIST!

YOU HAVEN'T ACTED
WITH ANY RESPONSIBILITY.

SAY GOOD-BYE TO YOUR
MAGICAL ABILITY.
NO!

OK, THESE
GUINEA PIGS LOOK JUST
LIKE THE ONES WE LOST.

DO YOU THINK THESE
WILL TRICK ALEX?

WHAT ARE YOU
DOING WITH
MY GUINEA PIGS?
YES, I DO.

Alex: MOM AND DAD
AREN'T REALLY AWAY
FOR THE WEEKEND.

I HAD
TO TURN THEM INTO
THESE GUINEA PIGS

TO KEEP THEM FROM
SEEING MY GRADES.

SO THE GUINEA PIGS
IN THE CAGE WERE
ACTUALLY MOM AND DAD.

YEAH. THESE GUINEA PIGS
ARE MOM AND DAD.

NO. WERE, BECAUSE THEY
SCURRIED OFF,

SO WE BOUGHT THESE
AT THE PET STORE.
OH, MAN!

OH, MAN!
OH, MAN!

WE'VE LOST
4 GUINEA PIGS!

HOW COULD YOU DO
SOMETHING SO STUPID?

ONLY A STUPID PERSON
WOULD THINK

THAT MY STUPID THING
WAS STUPIDER THAN
YOUR STUPID THING.

YOU DON'T EVEN
DESERVE TO HAVE
WIZARD POWERS, ALEX.

LOOK. THIS ISN'T ABOUT
ME RIGHT NOW.

THIS IS ABOUT FINDING
MOM AND DAD.

WHO YOU TURNED
INTO GUINEA PIGS!

OK, IT'S A LITTLE
ABOUT ME.

HERE'S WHAT WE SHOULD DO--
WE'LL ASK THESE GUINEA PIGS

WHERE GUINEA PIGS
WOULD RUN AWAY TO.

HOW ARE WE GONNA ASK
THESE GUINEA PIGS
ANYTHING?

USE THE TRANSFIGURATION
SPELL TO TURN THEM
INTO PEOPLE,

AND THEN THEY'LL BE
ABLE TO TELL US.

AH, YOU USE IT.
IT'S YOUR PROBLEM.

I CAN'T. CRUMBS
SUSPENDED MY POWERS
UNTIL MOM AND DAD SIGN
MY REPORT CARD.

WHAT? IS THERE
ANYTHING ELSE YOU
WANT TO TELL ME?

YEAH. THERE'S
NO EMERGENCY SANDWICH
SHOP CONVENTION.

NOBODY CARES
ABOUT YOUR STUPID
TORTILLA MOVEMENT.
OH!

NO. JUSTIN, WILL--
WILL YOU JUST HURRY
AND SAY THE SPELL, PLEASE?
FINE.

THESE GUINEA PIGS ARE
SMALL, DUMB, AND HAIRY.

MAKE THEM HUMAN TO FIND
THERESA AND JERRY.

YOU'VE GOT TO BE
KIDDING ME.
WE'RE HUMAN!

Man: I'M GONNA USE
MY OPPOSABLE THUMB
TO PICK STUFF UP.

CHECK IT OUT! I HAVE
THINGS IN BOTH HANDS!
ASK ME IF I'M OK.
ARE YOU OK?
YES, I AM! HA HA!
Alex: OK. SETTLE DOWN.

WE NEED YOUR HELP
FINDING A COUPLE OF
GUINEA PIGS--
GUINEA PEOPLE.

OOH! I SMELL
PEANUT BUTTER
AND JELLY CRUSTS!

AND DIRTY SOCKS
AND ORANGE SODA!

UNDER MAX'S BED!
UNDER
MAX'S BED!

OH, MAX, THE DOOR OPENS.
YOU CLEANED UP
IN HERE. GOOD!

EW!
UGH.

IS THIS MARSHMALLOW
SMEARED ON ASPARAGUS?

YES. YES, IT IS, JUSTIN.
THAT EXPERIMENT'S
ALMOST COMPLETE.

MAX, WHAT ARE YOU DOING
WITH MOM'S BLACK DRESS?

IT'S A DARTH VADER CAPE.
YOU PEOPLE HAVE
NO IMAGINATION.

THIS IS WHERE
MY LUCKY MUG WENT.
THERE THEY ARE!
HI, MOM. HI, DAD.

OH, THEY LOOK MAD.
MAYBE CHANGING THEM
BACK IS A BAD IDEA.

YEAH, IT'S A BAD IDEA.
LET'S JUST BE RAISED
BY TWO GUINEA PIGS.
Justin: OK.

THESE GUINEA PIGS
ARE NOW NOT.

MOM AND DAD
SHOULD FILL THEIR SLOT.

ALEX RUSSO, YOU ARE
IN SO MUCH TROUBLE.

LOOK, I CAN EXPLAIN,
BUT FIRST YOU GUYS
NEED TO KNOW

THAT PROFESSOR CRUMBS
IS COMING TO DISCUSS

MY HORRIBLE
REPORT CARD WITH YOU.

Alex: WERE YOU
EAVESDROPPING?

MR. AND MRS. RUSSO,
I AM HERE--
[SQUISH]

WHAT AM I
STANDING ON?

Max: UM, IT'S
MARSHMALLOW SURPRISE.

[WHISPERING]
THE SURPRISE
IS ASPARAGUS.

ALEX, DO YOU WANT TO
TELL PROFESSOR CRUMBS
WHERE WE WERE?

I TURNED THEM INTO
GUINEA PIGS TO KEEP
THEM FROM SEEING
MY REPORT CARD.

HMM. AND HOW DID THAT
WORK OUT FOR YOU?
NOT WELL.

Jerry: OH, I SEE YOU
HAVE ALEX'S POWERS.

DON'T LET THEM FALL
INTO THE WRONG HANDS.

OH, WAIT. THEY ALREADY
WERE IN THE WRONG HANDS.
Crumbs: YES, THEY WERE.

I AM TAKING AWAY HER
POWERS FOREVER.

I HAVE NEVER SEEN
SUCH A BLATANT DISREGARD

FOR THE STUDENT WIZARD
CODE OF CONDUCT.

NO, NO, NO.
PLEASE DON'T DO THIS.
I'VE COME THIS FAR.
IT'S NOT FAIR.

I'M AFRAID IT IS.
I SHALL TAKE
YOUR POWERS
AND BE ON MY WAY.
[CHATTERING]

Max: PROFESSOR CRUMBS HAS
TURNED INTO A GUINEA PIG.
SWEET!

DON'T LOOK AT ME.
I DON'T HAVE MY POWERS.
JUSTIN?
I PANICKED.

THIS IS MY PROBLEM,
NOT YOURS. DON'T LET
ME DRAG YOU DOWN.

BUT YOU DON'T DRAG ME DOWN.
I DON'T WANT YOU
TO LOSE YOUR POWERS.

EVERY TIME YOU MESS UP,
I HAVE TO THINK OF
A WAY TO FIX IT.
YOU MAKE ME A BETTER WIZARD.

LOOK, I DON'T KNOW.
PROFESSOR CRUMBS
AS A GUINEA PIG?

SOMEBODY'S GONNA
LOSE THEIR POWERS.
WELL, I'M NOT A WIZARD,

SO WHAT DO YOU GUYS
WANT FOR DINNER?

JUSTIN, YOU HAVE
TO CHANGE HIM BACK.

EVERYBODY JUST
HAS TO TAKE THEIR
MEDICINE.

THIS GUINEA PIG IS
A BAD DRESSER. TURN HIM
NOW INTO MY PROFESSOR.

JUSTIN RUSSO,
HOW DARE YOU!

YOU ARE SUPPOSED TO
BE A MODEL STUDENT.
I'M APPALLED.
I KNOW.

I DESERVE WHATEVER
PUNISHMENT YOU'RE
ABOUT TO GIVE ME.

PROFESSOR, THIS
IS ALL MY FAULT.

JUSTIN, I HEARD
WHAT YOU SAID
ABOUT YOUR SISTER

THROUGH
MY GUINEA PIG EARS.

AND IF YOU COULD
DO SOMETHING
LIKE THAT,
I CAN'T IGNORE IT.

YOU TWO BRING OUT
THE BEST IN EACH OTHER.
ALEX...

I KNOW I'M GOING
TO REGRET THIS,

BUT I AM RETURNING
YOUR POWERS

SO THAT YOU CAN TRAIN
ALONGSIDE YOUR BROTHER.
AND...
TO YOUR PUNISHMENT...

YOU BOTH WILL SPEND
THE NEXT TWO WEEKS
GROOMING MY BEARD.

I'LL SEE YOU
IN MY OFFICE
MONDAY MORNING AT 8:00.
BRING A COMB.

ALEX, IS THERE
SOMETHING YOU WANT
TO SAY TO YOUR BROTHER?

YEAH. THANKS FOR
STICKING UP FOR ME.

YEAH. PROFESSOR CRUMBS
REALLY BOUGHT THAT STORY
I LAID ON TO HIM

ABOUT YOU MAKING ME
A BETTER WIZARD.
[CHUCKLES]

YEAH, I REALLY
HATE YOU.
YEAH. I HATE YOU, TOO.

AND I GUESS IF IT
MEANS SO MUCH TO YOU,

I'LL SIGN YOUR
TORTILLA PETITION.
THANK YOU.

WELL, I REALLY HATE
BOTH OF YOU.

NOW WE DON'T HAVE ANY
GUINEA PIGS.

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

CAPTIONING PERFORMED BY
THE NATIONAL CAPTIONING
INSTITUTE, INC.
